name: Unbox (itch)
description:
Right now, home is just a new flat full of boxes. Unbox them. Find out what's in there. Decide where to put them. Try to complete a whole set of things, or just completely trash your new home!

Controls: WASD/Mouse - Walk / look around
LMB - Grab/Release item
RMB - Unbox
MMB - Rotate item
Mouse Wheel - Adjust item distance
Space - Jump

Made as part of the Cologne 2019 Global Game Jam.

For every 3 items you unbox, the time of day shifts so that the day is complete once you unwrapped 9 items. This adds a little replay value that we intended to pair with adding special interactions when certain items are put together (ie 3 kitchenware items), but this ended up being out of scope for the game jam. When trying to move large items across rooms, the player needs to be a little creative. In other words, push them out the window and dragging them in from the outside, which ended up being quite funny.

3D Art: Casilda de Zulueta, Luci Zhai

Gameplay & Tech: Robert Bazoiu, Alexander Kappen

Level Design: Robert Bazoiu

Music: Robert Bazoiu

Writing: Casilda de Zulueta
